Package mmj.lang

Class LogHyp

java.lang.Object
mmj.lang.MObj
mmj.lang.Stmt
mmj.lang.Hyp
mmj.lang.LogHyp
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.json.JSONString
public class LogHyp extends Hyp
LogHyp -- Logical Hypothesis -- corresponds to the Metamath "$e", or "essential hypothesis" statement.

Note: there is no rule stipulating that the "Logical Hypothesis" have a Type Code of "|-" or its equivalent in the LogicalSystem under such discussion. In other words, a "syntax hypothesis" could be "snuck in".

See Also:
  • Nomenclature and Entity-Relationship Notes

  • Method Details

    • BuildTempLogHypObject

      public static LogHyp BuildTempLogHypObject(int tempLogHypSeq, String tempLogHypLabel, Formula tempLogHypFormula, Hyp[] tempHypArray, ParseTree tempLogHypParseTree)
      Construct a LogHyp object that is temporary, in the sense that it will not be added to the Logical System Statement Table or participate in other features of mmj2.

      Beware: no real validation is performed, except that bogus input may generate IllegalArgumentException or ArrayOutOfBoundsException!

      Parameters:
      tempLogHypSeq - MObj.seq
      tempLogHypLabel - Stmt.label
      tempLogHypFormula - Stmt.formula
      tempHypArray - array containing VarHyps for formula but perhaps other Hyps as well
      tempLogHypParseTree - Stmt.exprParseTree
      Returns:
      the new LogHyp object

    • getMandVarHypArray

      public VarHyp[] getMandVarHypArray()
      Return the mandatory VarHyp array for this VarHyp.

      Simply return varHypArray, the VarHyp's used in the LogHyp's Formula.

      Specified by:
      getMandVarHypArray in class Stmt

    • renderParsedSubExpr

      public int renderParsedSubExpr(StringBuilder sb, int maxDepth, int maxLength, ParseNode[] child)
      Throws an IllegalArgumentException because a ParseTree for a parsed sub-expression should contain only VarHyp and Syntax Axiom nodes.
      Specified by:
      renderParsedSubExpr in class Stmt
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuilder already initialized for appending characters.
      maxDepth - maximum depth of Notation Syntax axioms in sub-tree to be printed. Set to Integer.MAX_VALUE to turn off depth checking.
      maxLength - maximum length of output sub-expression. Set to Integer.MAX_VALUE to turn off depth checking.
      child - array of ParseNode, corresponding to VarHyp nodes to be substituted into the Stmt.
      Returns:
      nothing
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - always
